about_the_game: Twilight Zone is a post-apocalyptic zombie background urban survival and tower defense game, you not only need to gather survivors hiding everywhere, in the streets full of danger to collect, produce the necessary supplies, but also need to lead the construction of fortifications, guarding the existing safe neighborhoods, and gradually expanding the safe area, until the city is cleared of all the zombies, lifting the crisis of the entire city.
